titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for certain reforms to disciplinary procedures applicable to members of the Senior Executive Service, and for other purposes.
Senior Executive Service Accountability Act
Senior Executive Service Accountability Act
Senior Executive Service Accountability Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Senior Executive Service Accountability Act
This bill revises various personnel procedures applicable to career employees in the Senior Executive Service.
